final_poem:
Echoes of emptiness remain
A silence that refuses to wane
The ache within, a hollowed space
Where laughter once resounded in its place

Fading light on forgotten days
 Memories suspended, lost in haze
Regret and longing intertwined like vines
As I am left with only shadows that decline

In the mirror's gaze, a ghostly face
A reflection of what time cannot erase
The pain of loss, a sorrow so divine
A heart once full now an endless chasm deep within
